response.overview: Bestowed with superhuman strength, a young mortal named Hercules sets out to prove himself a hero in the eyes of his father, the great god Zeus. Along with his friends Pegasus, a flying horse, and Phil, a personal trainer, Hercules is tricked by the hilarious, hotheaded villain Hades, who's plotting to take over Mount Olympus!
response.tagline: The man. The myth. The movie.
response.title: Hercules

cast.name: Jim Cummings
cast.character: Nessus the River Centaur / Tall Thebian / Elderly Thebian (voice)
